text: Derek Hough (born May 17, 1985 in Salt Lake City, Utah) is an American dancer, choreographer, musician, actor, and director. He has been a professional dancer on Dancing with the Stars since fall 2007. He has competed with Ricki Lake, Nicole Scherzinger, Brooke Burke, Jennifer Grey, Maria Menounos and Shawn Johnson. ==Biography== Hough grew up in Sandy, Utah, a suburb of Salt Lake City, Utah. ==Personal life== Hough's sister is Julianne Hough, also a dancer in Dancing with the Stars until 2009."Dancing with the Stars: Julianne Will Sit Out Next Season." TV Guide. November 20, 2008. Retrieved December 27, 2012. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Actors from Salt Lake City, Utah Category:Living people Category:singers from Utah Category:Musicians from Utah Category:American movie actors
